name: Flickr WideScreen (Part 2) v.219
description: It's ONLY for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! ‚ñ∫ Additional Userstyles to my "Flickr Widescreen (Part 1): for some userscripts (GM : Greasemonkey) i use since a long time and additional styles for some not often used Flickr's pages To install all parts of "Flickr Widescreen" together in one shot: On USw NEW 2021.07: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE [UserStyles World - USw] OR you can use my userscript : Flickr WideScreen - BigONE [Greasyfork] Greasy Fork now supports User CSS as defined here for use with Stylus or as UserScript, read: [Beta] User CSS support

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) - ByPass Sites Limitations Some example: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - YouTube: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) - Streaming : Stream - DuckDuckGo - Streaming Helper - T√©l√©vision: T√©l√©rama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray Note: Due to Userstyles.org limitation, some of my userstyles are minified (to reduce their size) by this online tool: CSS Minifier But now they are unreadable easily, sorry. You can watch their readable userstyle on Usertyles.World [USw] (or better use it!), because USw have not limit size when you post Many of my Userstyle are published on Userstyles.World [USw] too : Decembre [Userstyles.World [USw] It's a new site with a great accessibility and no limitation in size for the userstyle posted. I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : Decembre - My Favoris [GreasyFork] Just for info (deprecated): ‚òÖ MY ‚òÖ Installed ‚òÖ GM ‚òÖ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : Decembre Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: in GreasyFork. By example: - USERSTYLES - TABLES Sorter SIMPLE - Flickr - AUTO More Mini Thumbnail in Photo page Some my userstyles are published here too, by example: - Flickr WideScreen - BigONE I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait‚òÖFaces > Portrait‚òÖFaces‚òÖOpen Minded

additional_info: Find my other Userstyles: ‚ñ∫ UserStyles.world [USw] (the best alternative to Userstyles.org) decembre [USw] ‚ñ∫ USO Archives (Faster and more usable than Userstyles.org): Decembre [UserStyles.org Archive] ‚ñ∂ Note about this userstyle since V.171 On userstyles.org and Usertyles Archives (which archive for usertyles.org) only: My Code is to huge for Userstyles.org. I reduce it size with this online Tool: CSS Minifier But now it is unreadable easily, sorry. You can watch the readable userstyle on Usertyles.World [USw] (or better use it!), because USw have not limit size when you post. ‚ñ∂ All My "Flickr WideScreen" Userstyles. Initially, due to the same Userstyles.org size limit, it was need to split it in 3 parts: - Flickr WideScreen (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr WideScreen (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey ‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ You should install these 3 userstyles together, for a better results. ‚ñ∫ To install all of them at once: - Flickr WideScreen - BigONE [userstyles.world - USw] Or as userscript or Userstyles: - Flickr WideScreen - BigONE [GreasyFork] ‚ñ∫ Useful greasemonkey userscripts companions (write by me). - Flickr - AUTO ShowAllGroups (Photo Page) - Flickr - AUTO More Comments - Flickr - AUTO Video Play - Flickr - AUTO Video Replay - Flickr - AUTO More Mini Thumbnail: This script move the Mini-thumbnail under the user buddy icon and expand it on hover while it auto load more thumbnail in it. An indicator show the origin of the mini-thumbnail: - Stream - Favs etc... I use it always to navigate in stream, favs etc.... from Photo page. ‚ñ∫ Greasemonkey's Scripts that i use a lot too: - Flickr ‚òÖ Surf (USO Mirror) ‚ñ∫ Scripts Broken? read : Photopage scripts broken (HTTPS?) ‚ñ∂ You Can Find Many Other Updated Infos About Flickr Extensions / Userscripts / Userstyles / Applications.. In : ‚ñ∫ My BIG List (After New Photo Page Design (2014)) - Updated 2020 Or : Decembre [GitHub] ‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Additional Userstyle for some userscripts (GM : Greasemonkey) i use since a long time: ‚ñ∫ Flickr Functional Suite By Charles Tilford (USO Mirror) I Use it a lot and GOOD news, the author , Charles Tilford, sent to me an Update which work with the last firefox. Thanks to him!. Read Infos, Code Update and How to move our Old Color Flags from Greasemonkey to Tampermonkey: My Working Backup:(removed if the author update it): Flickr Functional Suite - Update 2014 [decembre GitHub] AND Flickr Functional Suite - NEW 2014 - Working Backup [Direct Install] ‚ñ∫ Flickr PM , with my TWEAK Script : Icons/new links for "flickr PM" My Working Backup: FLICKR PM - Decembre Fork - 2022 [Decembre GitHub] or GM - Flickr PM - Decembre Fork - 2022 [Decembre PasteBin] ‚ñ∫ Number of Favs on Photostream Photos, and Pool pages (USO Mirror) " My Working Backup: GM - Number of Favs on Photostream (Alesadam) Tweak Https+Require [Decembre PasteBin] ‚ñ∫ Stig's Flickr Fixr - Multifeature browser extensions (or userscript) ‚ñ∫ Flickr Cross-Recommendations - LAST Patch (USO Mirror)" Thumbnail : ADD a Reserved Space (at the Bottom of the SideBar)for its thumbnail, tweaked by me to have 3 rows of thumbs (27thumbs). My Working Backup: GM - Flickr Cross-Recommendations - NEW Flickr (avr 2015) [Decembre PasteBin] ‚ñ∫ Flickr Commented On (USO MIRROR) was broken... But can be fixed : The following change to the script fixed this problem for me.... : My Working Backup: GM - Flickr Commented On (HTTPS) - TWEAK [Decembre PasteBin] ‚ñ∫ Flickr Quick Links, By steeev (USO Mirror) (showing them in the Flickr Nav Bar (after Hover) ‚ñ∫ Flickr Buddy Interesting (USO Mirror) : Quick access to user's interesting photos from the Buddy Icon Menu. I tweak it to show quickly 250 thumbs at once(Fill all the windows) !!! My Working Backup: GM - Flickr Buddy Interesting by Pierre Andrews - TWEAK [Decembre PasteBin] New : v.55 correction for it... ‚ñ∂Last Changes: My Code is to huge for Userstyles.org: I reduce it size with this onlineTool: CSS Minifier Others changes >v.209: - Move some Code from Part1 (too huge) to here... - Adaptation for code change around Top NavBar - Adaptation for new Code Change in Photo Page (2020.06.11): .".photo-notes-scrappy-view-OLD" revert to "photo-notes-scrappy-view" ".photo-well-scrappy-view-OLD" revert to ".photo-well-scrappy-view" - Photo PAge: Notes, all popups used in it, fine tuning - Rework SlideShow - New function? - User info Modal on hover the user buddy icon (On photo page ) - Galleries - OLD View before 2018 (seems not in use now...): https://www.flickr.com/help/forum/en-us/72157720068442958/#reply72157720081770587 - Add Support The New Notification System (in progress...): Ramping New Flickr Notifications Center and Settings to all members. - Add a Dark Minimal style for readability (but it's better to use my : Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey (you can remove it - Top of my CSS - if you don't like) - General Corrections (last one in first): Many in v.180: Rework for the Photo page (Right side aligned, Favorits User list reverse order, etc ...) Photo / Buddy Icon Editor, All Modal popups, Title/Decsription Editor, "Add to Pool/ Gallery" (with click on "+" icon), Fav Star, Top header improve, Pool Discussion / Help Forum, no ADS in Photo page ...... etc .. - Improve Menu (after click on "edit" icon near buddy) on the photo page to Editing Photo (need too "ALLinONE Part 1") - Better GM "Flickr Functional Suite" on Poll/Fav/Gallery/Album. - Add support for Stig's Flickr Fixr - Multifeature browser extensions (or userscript)
